Lyric:
[by:清晨自渎]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]

[00:10.64]I am tired of this place, I hope people change 
[00:15.81]I need time to replace what I gave away
[00:21.25]And my hopes, they are high, I must keep them small
[00:26.62]Though I try to resist I still want it all

[00:32.21]I see swimming pools and living rooms and airplanes
[00:37.33]I see a little house on the hill and childrens' names
[00:42.52]I see quiet nights poured over ice and Tanqueray 
[00:48.25]But everything is shattering and it's my mistake 

[00:52.54]Only fools fall for you, only fools 
[00:58.12]Only fools do what I do, only fools fall 
[01:03.47]Only fools fall for you, only fools
[01:08.99]Only fools do what I do, only fools fall 
[01:18.11]
[01:25.73]Oh, our lives don't collide, I'm aware of this 
[01:30.82]The differences and impulses and your obsession with it 
[01:36.40]The little things, you like stick, and I like aerosol
[01:41.79]Don't give a fuck, not giving up, I still want it all 

[01:46.98]Only fools fall for you, only fools 
[01:52.21]Only fools do what I do, only fools fall 
[01:57.59]Only fools fall for you, only fools 
[02:03.06]Only fools do what I do, only fools fall
